channel.title: Recoloring service!
channel.description:
Hi. I will recolor an item for you, if it's in the revision of 474 or below I can recolor via ints, I might do 508+ models depending on the model.
Post away. I'm about to do a pack of recolors I thought should've been in the game (like yellow boots)
Basic recolors: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,382745.0.html

item.title: Recoloring service!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:67, topic:478978”]What about my model bro? and can you recolor a d claws into a brighter model? (like the new upd d claws on rs)?[/quote]What model…? The frost bones? I don’t have the models for those. I said I can’t do items 474+… I’m not offering this service anymore, since people can’t read or request properly.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“the elve age, post:58, topic:478978”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=597195.msg4277332#msg4277332 date=1365100539]

[quote author=the elve age link=topic=597195.msg4277284#msg4277284 date=1365096027]

Do you do rainbow colours? :rolleyes:
[/quote]Depends, usually you have to change the model’s framework. What model are you thinking of?

Rainbow firecape O_o
[/quote]The firecape uses a fire texture in the client. You just have dump the text open it in paint color it rainbow and replace back in your cache -.-[/quote]

I know :S
I’m sure you can recolour texture though.

Read full topic

item.title: Recoloring service!
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Recolor this to white please

if(i == 15349) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 4686; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 854;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 540;//Model Rotation class8.anInt198 = 2039;//model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt204 = 144;//Unknown class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.anInt169 = 9;// model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 5;//model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 4687;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 4688;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Bandos tassets";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Its A Pair Of Bandos Tassets".getBytes();//examin info }
thanks

Read full topic

And it's purple! Go figure.".getBytes(); }
